# serval_group (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "serval_group" "example_group" {
  name = "name"
  user_ids = ["string"]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `name` (String)
- `user_ids` (List of String)

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) A timestamp in RFC 3339 format (e.g., "2017-01-15T01:30:15.01Z").
- `deleted_at` (String) A timestamp in RFC 3339 format (e.g., "2017-01-15T01:30:15.01Z").
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `organization_id` (String)

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
$ terraform import serval_group.example '<id>'
```
